attributes.action: recommend Jayne Torvill & Christopher Dean for Knighthoods for their contirubtion to the sport of Ice Dance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jayne Torvill & Christopher Dean have elevated the sport of Ice Dance in the public consciousness.  Twenty Five years after their historic Olympic Gold Medal winning performance, they continue to promote the sport through television and live performance.  In recognition of this, the Prime Minister should nominate Jayne & Christopher for the highest Civic Honour.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
